channel.title: Help pl0x!
channel.description:
Hi i want to know how to lower price of items And i wanna know how to lower lvls needed for items..
Any1 knows?

item.title: Help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

price:
in item.cfg search for the id of the item
example

4151

it might hit a few things before coming to the item
there are number groupings
###, #####, #####, #, #
1-3 are prices, edit the second one to change overal price
4-8 are attack bonuses
9-13 are defense bonuses
14 is strength bonuses
15 is prayer bonuses

req: search for in client.java

public boolean process()

under one of the } add this
if (playerEquipment[playerX1] == X2 && playerLevel[X3] <= X4) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerX1], 1);
}
X1 - the name of the equip slot
example
Helmet
Cape
Arrows
Weapon
Hands
Hat
X2 - the item id
X3 the player level number
X4 - one less then the item req
example
if the req is 55 you would put <= 54
welcome

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @nzallstars nzallstars
item.description:
@nzallstars wrote:

Here

Open Item.cfg
i’ll use berserker ring as example

Search for: item = 6737 Berserker_Ring

You sud see

item = 6737	Berserker_Ring	A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer.	60000	6000000	80000	9	9	29	9	2	49	49	20	20	49	25	23
Change the 60000,6000000,80000

Play around with it , it multiplys in a weird way but what ihave atm the berserker ring costs 7m

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

look for something like this

			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) {
				return 100;

as it is you need 100 def to wear anything with white at the start of it but to make it so you can wear a white party hat at 1 def yet still need 100 def for white armor you add this

			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("White partyhat")) {
				return 1;

so now it look like this

			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("White partyhat")) {
				return 1;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) {
				return 100;

just edit the code to your needs

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

What i told you is not just for defense. Its for everything. Its a glitch that if you have that in then anything starting with “black” will not be wearable under the level you stated.

You could remove that whole thing and fix the bug like i did. It takes a while though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Ok, go into client.java and search for

			if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) {

you should see something like

return 1;

under it. now change the 1 to what you want the requirements to be.

Go to item.cfg then find the item name and go over change the first 3 numbetrs (BE AWARE IF YOU GO TO HIGH IT WILL BE MAX CASH!) I THINK THE PRICE GETS DEVIDED OR MULTIPLYED BY SOME NUMBER TO GET THE PRICE! ASK SOMONE ABOUT THAT!)

Read full topic
